message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Alice, $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in your product, but I can only go up to $85 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and I understand your budget. I'm willing to come down to $95.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's try to reach an agreement!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still not quite there. How about $90?  It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can close the deal.
